title: The Assistant
description: From USA Today bestselling author, Marni Mann, comes a haunting new contemporary romance.    At 42, I’m married to my best friend and we have two beautiful children. I’ve built one of the largest, most successful companies in Vermont. My life couldn’t be more perfect. So, how did it all fall apart so quickly? One meeting. That was all it took. And now … none of us will ever be the same.
author: Marni Mann
